Summary: Small bit of light moving to fast be be a plane N to S.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cadyville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile doing some fall planting on a clear day at 2:20 PM I took the last few ounces of water from my water bottle by tilting the bottom to the sky. While my neck was craned back and I was looking directly overhead I saw a small amorphous bit of light traveling fast North to South. The whole sighting lasted only 2 to 3 seconds. The bit of light moved left to right a couple of times then traveled a little further in the same N-S direction and was gone before it hit the horizon. As soon a I noticed the light and the speed I knew it was not a plane or a bird or a reflection or swamp gas. As soon as it was gone I called my wife to tell her. I was quite excited. As I watched it I yelled "Holy Crap".
